== Milestone 1 ==
=== Goal: ===
Basic PvP Server

=== Implements: ===
 * Database <font color="green">`[`implemented`]`</font>
 * Account creation <font color="red">`[`not yet implemented`]` </font>
 * Login <font color="green">`[`implemented`]`</font>
 * Character creation <font color="blue">`[`work started`]`</font>
 * Load into Instances <font color="green">`[`implemented`]`</font>
 * Support multiple clients <font color="brown">`[`partly implemented`]`</font>
 * NPCs <font color="green">`[`implemented`]`</font>
 * Party Window / Form groups <font color="red">`[`not yet implemented`]`</font>
 * Player Stats (HP/MP/LVL) <font color="red">`[`not yet implemented`]` </font>
 * Items <font color="brown">`[`wip`]`</font>
 * Skills <font color="blue">`[`work started`]`</font>
 * PvP Buttons (Enter Battle) / maybe through Dialogues <font color="red">`[`not yet implemented`]`</font>
 * (Custom) Dialogues <font color="green">`[`implemented`]`</font>
 * Basic collision detection <font color="green">`[`implemented`]`</font> (though not really accurate yet)
 * Chat <font color="brown">`[`partly implemented`]`</font>
 * Click to move <font color="red">`[`not yet implemented`]`</font> ( may be delayed to Milestone 2)
 * Basic PvP Formats (DM/Kill) <font color="red">`[`not yet implemented`]`</font>
